title: Candy & chocolate

description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Create a ganache from a large block of chocolate, then shape and coat your own truffles. Become adept at making the sugar syrup which forms the base of so many confectionary recipes. With a little practice, the rewards are sweet indeed. Recipes include: "Academy Dark Truffles", laced with orange and almond liquers, old fashioned "Toffee Bars" and glistening "Glazed Fruit".
